TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsStructure extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

Docs.summary: Represents the or element of an .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class has no public constructor. References to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure> are obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A> methods.
For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elements of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>, see Chapter 9 in the *XPS Paper Specification (XPS)* which you can download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
